description:
Manage your IDEs the easy way

Open any of your projects in any of the IDEs with one click.
What's New in Toolbox App 2.6
Remote Development Support – Manage JetBrains tools and projects both locally and on remote servers in Toolbox.
- Cross-Platform – Connect to Linux, Windows, and macOS remote hosts.
- Remote JetBrains IDE Management – Install, update, and monitor IDEs on remote servers just like locally.
- Secure OpenSSH Integration – Full OpenSSH support, including ProxyJump, MFA, and custom configurations.
- Introducing the ability to change the font size TBX-6057
- Support for Windows ARM64 architecture TBX-8560
